backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Declares three frontend feature reports affecting App.tsx, including updated question text and celebration meme changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of all frontend files including App, modal, hooks, styles, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style variables defining OKLCH color tokens and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry mounting root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with Valentine question, evasive No button, celebration screen, hearts animation, and letter modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/LetterModal.tsx: Dialog component that displays a scrollable romantic letter with decorative styling.
frontend/src/content/valentineLetter.ts: Exports the full romantic letter text used in the modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Generates random safe positions for an evasive No button within a container.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity lifecycle logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, global styles, background imagery, and custom utilities including float animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors tied to CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, feature definitions, and image instructions for the Valentine proposal web page.
